message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, we're extending this exclusive opportunity to you at an introductory price of $140. This is a special offer tailored just for you, considering the significant worth you see in it, which aligns perfectly with our goal of providing exceptional value to our customers. We're confident it will meet your needs and expectations. Please let us know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.
